Row.Text: Slow Words, Deep Feelings

Values [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Gold] Gold output. Likes civilizations with high [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture output that favor peace; dislikes civilizations with high [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture output that invade other nations.

Moca Aoba, a slow voice can't hide deep affection, a mischievous smile can't conceal consideration. Her usual carefree cheerfulness can see into the deepest knots of the heart—after all, both bread and strategy are fermented wisdom. Perhaps past habits are only suited for amusing a small circle; but beyond point cards, there are similar wits. Just maintain that relaxed mindset, and fortune will surely come "kneading" your way.
Plead to Babanbo-sama
Plead to Babanbo-sama
Moca's unique project, available in the Palace when Babanbo-sama dies. Upon completion, removes the Babanbo Statue from the Capital and resurrects Babanbo-sama.
Babanbo Statue
A special building generated in the Capital after Babanbo-sama's death. +8 [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Build a Diplomatic Quarter with a Builder.

All friendly units (including self) within 3 tiles do not suffer [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength penalties when injured, and heal 90 [ICON_Damaged] HP after killing a unit.
After combat, gain [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to the total HP lost by both sides.
If you did not move, gain +1 additional [ICON_Strength] attack this turn. Adjacent friendly military units immediately receive a free [ICON_Promotion] promotion after killing a unit.
All friendly units (including self) within 3 tiles gain +10 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points and +10 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points after killing an enemy unit.
When killing a unit with higher base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, gain 1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy. When capturing a city, gain 2 [ICON_Governor] Governor Titles and one free technology.
At the start of the turn, all friendly units (including self) within 6 tiles gain 30 [ICON_Gold] Gold and 30 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each adjacent Mountain-type tile.

All cities gain +25% [ICON_Production] Production when building Wonders. Each time Babanbo-sama dies, all of Moca's cities gain +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, +1 [ICON_Citizen] Population, and each Population provides an additional +4 [ICON_Production] Production.

Ignores Zone of Control and penalties to [ICON_Movement] Movement from terrain, features, and rivers. +6 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for each type of [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person ever recruited.
+100% experience gain.
Does not suffer [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength penalties when injured.
Heals 90 [ICON_Damaged] HP after killing a unit.
Gains +10 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points after killing an enemy unit.
Gains +10 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points after killing an enemy unit.
At the start of the turn, gains 30 [ICON_Gold] Gold and 30 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each adjacent Mountain-type tile.
Great Person types recruited provide + {Property} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
Little Moca is going to dig in~
The lead guitarist of Afterglow, her 0.5x speed soft speech is irresistibly charming. But when singing, Moca can enunciate very clearly—so, Mo~ca~ is~ not~ slow~ at~ all~~
Although she often sleeps in class, she has the best academic performance in Afterglow. Also possesses an excellent sense of music, able to play back melodies after hearing them just once.

Always wearing a mischievous smile, Moca is the most mysterious member of Afterglow, skillfully evading any topic she doesn't wish to disclose, leaving even her four childhood friends not fully understanding her. While Moca usually seems to enjoy teasing her friends, she is actually the most perceptive among the band members, especially when it comes to caring for her companions, and is also the one who understands Ran the best.

Moca is obsessed with bread, with Yamabuki Bakery's products being her favorite. With an astonishing appetite, Moca can easily eat over ten bread items in one sitting, then, true to her prankster nature, claims "the fat got transferred to Hi-chan". She also has a habit of collecting point cards, often trying to use them to get bread for "free".
(Compiled from Moegirlpedia)
See the "Babanbo-sama" section on the Great Person page.

"Babanbo-sama" originates from Episode 12 of the mini-comedy anime "BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! PICO". In this episode, to cure Ran's persistent high fever, the other four members of Afterglow tried every folk remedy. Moca found information stating that "the Ungaruhoganga tribe believes illness is caused by demons; praying to the spirit Babanbo is said to bring recovery," so the group enshrined Ran along with offerings to summon the god.

This side story, along with the meme "Supervise BanG! Dream, save Sakura", and the bizarrely fitting style of "Babanbo-sama" with Moca's character, made it one of the most memorable episodes of the Pico series.
Literally refers to the disease-curing role Babanbo-sama plays in the local folklore (?) and the "functions" performed by Moca and the others.

Moca enjoys collecting point cards, especially those from Yamabuki Bakery, and has even tried to pay solely with points (to get bread). She also once tried to share her sadness using Ran's rock microphone at CiRCLE studio because her point cards had expired.

Just as Rimi loves chocolate coronet bread, Moca has her own favorite: melonpan. Melonpan resembles the Chinese "pineapple bun" but differs in texture and other aspects. It's a frequent guest in ACGN works, beloved by classic characters like Shana and Shiina Mashiro.

"Lost One's Goukoku" is a famous Vocaloid song by Neru, using the Kagamine Rin voice library, reflecting the pain of students lost in the sea of academics. Afterglow's cover debuted in 2018, featuring Ayane Sakura's dedicated performance belting the high notes in the chorus, leading to the phrase "Sakura Throat Protection Association".

Moca's first impression is often her drawn-out speech. But little Moca is a genius after all, so clearly, her speech speed can also be considered "very fast"—the greatest voices have no sound; who knows if there are words between the words?
Himari always worries about dieting, while Moca never seems to gain weight. From their back-and-forth banter, the playful saying "transferring the fat to Hi-chan" naturally emerged.

The members of Afterglow are childhood friends who grew up together, a "community of fate" bound by a tacit understanding that needs no emphasis. The band days filled with life's turbulence, along with the intensely hot sunsets viewed from the heights, have long been etched into the members' hearts.
I felt back then that I had to be with Ran, no matter what, and always be there to give her a push from behind. Eh~ you feel the same way, right~?
But, even though they struggle like that, they're actually very afraid of being alone, you know...
She likes highly developed civilizations that uphold peace.
She dislikes leading civilizations that invade other nations.
Hmm~ Hmm~ Hmm~
Oh dear, little Moca can't agree just yet~ — Eh~ if you sigh, happiness will run away, you know~!
Little Moca is very kind, you see~ Can't just leave friends alone. Ehehe~
Hmm~ Hmm~ Hmm~
Oh dear, little Moca can't agree just yet~ — Eh~ if you sigh, happiness will run away, you know~!
Ah~ If there are devils in this world, then your synchronization rate is nothing to scoff at~[NEWLINE]Moca "Holmes" Aoba has seen through it all; you two must be really close, huh~
Ah~ If there are devils in this world, then your synchronization rate is nothing to scoff at~[NEWLINE]Moca "Holmes" Aoba has seen through it all; you two must be really close, huh~
Oh, no one's here again today~... When no one's watching, the sunset disappears in the blink of an eye...
Oh, no one's here again today~... When no one's watching, the sunset disappears in the blink of an eye...
You're welcome~ Then little Moca will graciously accept it too~
No thanks~ Little Moca will have to decline this time~
Little Moca brought a bread set from Yamabuki Bakery, you see: Bacon & Shrimp Bread, Croissants, and even Mille-feuille~ — Well~ if you don't want to miss out, you'd better dig in quickly~
Hmm~ That's not very Tsugumi-like at all~!
Hmm~ That's not very Tsugumi-like at all~!
My name is Moca Aoba. Currently, I'm the guitarist for Afterglow. Oh~, and also, I really love bread~
There's a very tasty bakery near us, you know~ Want to go now?
...Huh? What am I doing? It's that place, boss. Gonna stop by the 'usual place' on the way—the bakery on your side~
Seems like you have quite a story too~ As an exchange, little Moca can give you a rare, out-of-print voucher for Yamabuki Bakery~
Ah, hello. Fancy meeting you here, what a coincidence~
Phew~ Seeing your smile, I feel relieved and now I'm getting sleepy...
Hoo, hoo, hoo~. You'll have to be much more careful when walking at night from now on, you know~
How cruel~ Even the clever little Moca is starting to not understand why you've come to this point, you know?
